Package com.uco.ucodgt.mvc.model.data.worker

Class WorkerDAO

java.lang.Object
com.uco.ucodgt.mvc.model.data.worker.WorkerDAO
public class WorkerDAO extends Object
This class provides methods to interact with a database or external services for managing worker-related data.

      applicationContext - The application context.
      callback - The callback to handle the result of the login check.

      callback - The callback to handle the result of the email check.

    • updateUser

      public void updateUser(WorkerDTO userToFind, android.content.Context applicationContext, UserCallback callback)
      Updates the data of a worker user in the database.
      Parameters:
      userToFind - The WorkerDTO object containing the unique identifier (DNI) of the user and the updated information.
      applicationContext - The context of the application.
      callback - The callback to handle the result of the update operation.
